description: This file defines a custom theme configuration for a Flutter application, specifically creating and returning a ThemeData object with specific color schemes, component styles, and visual properties tailored to the 'Ocean' theme.

classes.name: ColorScheme
classes.description: Defines the color palette used throughout the Flutter theme.

classes.name: RoundedRectangleBorder
classes.description: Specifies a shape with rounded corners used for component shapes like Card and BorderRadius.

classes.name: ThemeData
classes.description: Holds the overall theme configuration for the Flutter app.

classes.name: InputDecorationTheme
classes.description: Defines styling for input decoration in text fields.

classes.name: TextTheme
classes.description: Defines text styles used for different text types.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object with custom settings for the Ocean theme.
